screen_desc: The screenshot is from the Google Play Store page for the Spotify Lite app. It shows the app's rating, number of downloads, and a brief description of its features. There are also recommended apps and similar apps at the bottom.
action_think: The user requested to uninstall the Spotify app. Since the app is visible on the screen, the next action should be to open the app settings to uninstall it.
action_plan: Swipe left on the Spotify app to reveal the app menu.
Tap on the 'Uninstall' option in the app menu to remove the app from the device.
